001package com.telos.loops.transport;
002
003import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
004import java.util.Collections;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
006import org.slf4j.Logger;
007import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
008
009public class NoopTransport implements Transport {
010  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(NoopTransport.class);
011
012  private final TransportResponse response;
013
014  public NoopTransport() {
015    this(new TransportResponse(200, Collections.emptyMap(), new byte[0]));
016  }
017
018  public NoopTransport(int statusCode, String jsonBody) {
019    this.response =
020        new TransportResponse(
021            statusCode,
022            Collections.emptyMap(),
023            jsonBody == null ? new byte[0] : jsonBody.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
024  }
025
026  public NoopTransport(TransportResponse response) {
027    this.response = response;
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  public TransportResponse execute(TransportRequest request) {
032    log.debug("NoopTransport.execute: req={}, res={}", request, response);
033    return response;
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  public CompletableFuture<TransportResponse> executeAsync(TransportRequest request) {
038    log.debug("NoopTransport.executeAsync: req={}, res={}", request, response);
039    return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(response);
040  }
041}
